about.heading: About me
about.description: I specialize in implementing Front-End solutions, but I am ambitious in becoming well-rounded in the IT industry. I have several years of experience in building web applications, designing UI, and have a basic understanding of UX.
about.description-2: I am capable of working independently and as part of a team. I am always willing to help others and enjoy learning, sharing knowledge, and listening attentively. Regardless of the challenge, I strive to achieve a perfect product with appropriate performance, usability, and accessibility. I work intelligently to achieve this.

heading.part-1: I have been in the industry continuously

description.part-1: Participating in the development of the following applications

personal-projects.heading: # A few projects that I am currently working on

description.part-1: In my free time, I try to implement my own ideas
description.part-2: and I am happy to share them with others.

project-1.title: Root Wood Studio
project-1.description: One of my first ideas implemented after hours. An online store for desks for the most demanding customers.

project-2.title: Dribbi
project-2.description: An application that tracks the duration of performed operations. Similar to the Toggl app, but fully free and with slightly different features.
